channel.title: grafana on Nicole van der Hoeven
channel.description: Recent content in grafana on Nicole van der Hoeven

item.title: Monitoring your k6 load test: how to install Grafana and Prometheus on a Kubernetes cluster
item.description:
Running a load test is half of the equation, and not having the right observability tools to see how your application responds to the load can sometimes flat-out invalidate a test.

Here’s how to install open-source tools Grafana and Prometheus on a Kubernetes cluster in DigitalOcean and how a performance user could use them for increased visibility during a load test.

item.title: How we work at k6 - building software & working remotely with CTO Pawel Suwala (k6 Office Hours #23)
item.description: For this episode of k6 Office Hours, I got the k6 Chief Technical Officer, Pawel Suwala, to give a bit of a behind-the-scenes of how we work at k6 and what we’re working on next. We talked about the methodology we use for building k6, the different teams we have, and exciting new features that are coming soon!

item.title: A tester's overview of Grafana Labs open-source projects
item.description: Since the acquisition of k6 by Grafana Labs, the entire k6 team has been absorbed into the new, larger team that we’re suddenly a part of. Grafana Labs maintains a lot of projects, so I was very quickly overwhelmed with things to learn about all of them. Here’s my attempt to make sense of the Grafana Labs landscape, and perhaps it can help some of you as well:

item.title: Acquisition talk with CEOs Raj Dutt (Grafana) and Robin Gustafsson (k6) (k6 Office Hours #19)
item.description: This week on k6 Office Hours, Simme and I were joined by two CEOs: k6 CEO Robin Gustafsson and Grafana Labs CEO Raj Dutt. It was a little nerve-wracking to have two CEOs on the stream, but it did give us the opportunity to ask both of them pointed questions on Grafana Labs’s acquisition of k6, including any plans they have for how both companies could integrate better in the future.

item.title: What you need to know about Grafana Labs's acquisition of k6
item.description:
Recently, during Grafanaconline 2021, Grafana Labs CEO Raj Dutt announced the acquisition of k6– the company I work for. What does this mean? Here’s a video I made to explain it all:

Simme and I have also discussed the acquisition twice on k6 Office Hours:

  • once with our CEO, Robin Gustafsson
  • and another time with both Robin and Raj, Grafana Labs CEO

TL;DW: We unanimously agree it’s a positive thing. I myself am cautiously optimistic about the future of both k6 and Grafana Labs.

item.title: k6 is part of Grafana Labs! AMA with CEO Robin Gustafsson (k6 Office Hours #17)
item.description:
On this week’s Office Hours, Simme and I were joined by Robin Gustafsson, the CEO of k6, to make a big announcement: k6 has been acquired by Grafana Labs.

The folks at Grafana Labs have been fans of k6 for a while, and we’ve been fans (and users) of their work since almost the beginning of k6. While a surprise to many, Grafana and k6 together is a combination that makes sense.

Read Grafana’s press release here to hear more about this milestone.
